experience.description:

- Adaptation – organizing 1-1 meetings with TMs and managers
- Effective collaboration within leadership groups and cross-functional teams

industries.name: System Integration, Technological and Business Processes Automation, IT Consulting

experience.description:
- Exclusive IT-recruitment with German + English language skills – SW Developers – Java, JS, C/C++, QA (manual testing, automated testing, penetration), Team Leaders, SAP (SD, MM, BI, PP, ABAP, etc.) Configuration Managers, Technical Support, etc.
Demand: ≥120 FTE per month
- Executive search and Headhunting
- Projects: T-Mobile, Daimler, De-Mail, Nycomed, BMW, Audi, Lufthansa, etc.
- HR Team Recruitment (search for candidates, interviews, decision, adaptation, mentoring)
- Organizing and enhancing effective HR team work of recruiters (trainings, projects support)
- Active participation in communication with international customers – HR BA role to better define the requirements for the projects
- Onboarding – development of gift products, new hire book, conducting welcome-trainings for newcomers
- Adaptation process – regular meetings with TMs and managers 
- Designing, initiating and managing successful programs for the projects "Java School", "Test School" with Technical Team Leaders. 95-97 % of the graduates have been recruited from each graduation on a regular basis and passed the probation period successfully.  
- Opening of a branch in Voronezh – recruitment from scratch (facility, back-office, IT Dev Ops, QA,..), Implementation of projects «Java-school» and «Test-school» to attract the best students and graduates from the market.
- HR-branding (Conferences, exhibitions at the Universities to increase the visibility and hire the best talents)
- Exit interview and retention 
- EMEA recruitment reporting
